dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The CARLA Simulator is an open urban driving simulator designed to provide a platform for the development of autonomous driving agents, featuring a variety of virtual cities and vehicle models.
dcterms:title: CARLA Simulator

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark suite for evaluating computer vision algorithms in the context of autonomous driving, providing various tasks including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Wen
D. Du
Z. Cai
Z. Lei
M. Chang
H. Qi
J. Lim
M. Yang
S. Lyu
dcterms:description: The UA-DETRAC dataset is a benchmark and protocol for multi-object detection and tracking, consisting of video sequences recorded by stationary traffic surveillance cameras.
dcterms:title: UA-DETRAC dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Brazil
X. Liu
dcterms:description: M3D-RPN is a monocular 3D region proposal network designed for object detection, focusing on generating 3D bounding boxes from 2D images.
dcterms:title: M3D-RPN
